data.description:
Space Elevator is a ridiculously easy-to-use design tool that allows you to step into the role of an architect. Design your dream house, explore how color influences your mood, or step beyond conventional architecture and create spaces that feel truly otherworldly. 

KEY FEATURES:

- BUILD using collections of adjustable construction elements.
- FURNISH your rooms with over 180 pieces of furniture.
- PLANT your garden with custom-made trees and plants.
- SOUNDSCAPE using a library of sounds to bring your scenes to life.
- LIGHT your environment with a large selection of skies. 
- EXPORT your scene to glb for further editing in software like Blender
- SHARE your scene with others and add new files to your headset using Space Elevatorâ€™s tiny file format.
- LEARN the principles of spatial design at Elevator Academy.

Do you have any questions, want to explore what others are creating, or need additional building files? Visit our website at SpaceElevatorVR.com.

changelog.change_log:
- Various smaller updates & improvements.
- Snap furniture to surfaces while instantiating.
- Improved highlights.
- New furniture.
- Improved instantiate tool.
- Suburb environment.
- Doors open after being placed.
- Save As option added to save tool.
- File ID & mapping fix (fixed issues with special characters).
